reviews.review: Very fun puzzle game with some great jokes thrown in! This game is 100% worth your money!

Very, very fun game. Amazing puzzles, and nice story too. The co-op is just as fun, and while the stage builder is nice too, it could use a little work. I think there are mods that make the course maker better though, and I haven't checked them out yet, so idk. Overall, 9/10, would definitely recommend.
Buy it. The game play is great, and the dialogue is incredibly memorable.
jeg elsket historien jeg elsket karakterene humoren alt om spillet 9/10 det eneste jeg ikke likte var loading screens hele tiden
One of the greatest games ever, nothing more needs to be said!

Ещё один шедевр от VALVe.

Рекомендую
If you like puzzle games and a nice story, this is the game for you.
juegazo 10/10 puzzles complicados buena historia y lo mejor los mapas de la comunidad igual de dificiles que en el modo historia ademas de ser un juego barato mucho mejor que portal 1
it is in my opinion, one of the best games made so far because it builded on the 1st game and the gameplay is amazing and the story is amazing. 11/10

The story is amazing and really engaging with amazing gameplay and animations. The soundtrack fits perfectly and is fun to play with mates on the multiplayer. I have played through this game multiple times and it never good old. Not once.
I first played this in my Xbox 360 but it was so good that I had to buy it on pc so I could play it with my friends.
Had an amazing time even on the second run of the game. amazing story and experience.

If you want a challenging puzzle game w/ co-op and replay value, then look no further!

Don't worry about the specs. Runs on potat PCs, just make sure your GPU supports at least Directx version 9.0c. 

No doubt that you'll fall in love with the characters, story and gameplay.

Oh it also has taunts/emotes and hats, so it's good if you like Team Fortress 2 :D

My honest opinion? It combines simple mechanics to create a mind-boggling puzzles, you could spend a solid two hours trying to figure out a room before, eventually, giving up... HOWEVER - should you complete the room, you'll get to experience the most blessed clarity in your life. My IQ increases by 0.02 each time I solve a puzzle.

Co-op amplifies the enjoyment too. And since it's a convenient game that can practically run on any PC, you should be able to co-op this with your grandmother or flat chested goth GF that has never played a game in her life - or just a bud.

[b] What. A. Gem.[/b]

this game is great, it runs fast, the graphics are outstanding, and the story has twists and turns while still providing a brain puzzling gameplay experience. I cannot recommend enough!

Portal serisinin 2. oyununu hala oynamadıysan gözünde o kadar büyütmene gerek yok bulmacalar o kadar zor değil arkaya chill müzik açarsın oyun gider ve ayrıca yüksek grafiklerde oynamalısın. Benim bu oyundaki en sevdiğim olay Half-Life evreni ile aynı evrende geçiyor olmasıdır ki bu da Half-life veya Portal'ın 3. oyununda oyunun yapımcılarının Portal ve Half-Life adındaki oyunların olay örgülerini tek bir oyuna düzenli bir biçimde yerleştirebilecek olma ihtimali beni gerçekten heyecanlandırıyor .  (Böyle bir oyuna böyle bir açıklama yapmam gerekir.)
honestly the best game iv'e played

相比起来，最后的解密房间之后的通往boss之路还有boss战的难度确实有点低，基本上不需要怎么思考。
但是仍然是我玩过的最棒的解密类游戏！

If you like Portal 1, you'll love Portal 2. It takes all of the good things about its predecessor, from its puzzles to its writing, and makes them even better. Plus, the addition of it's co-op campaign and the fact that you can upload custom maps directly to Steam are great. However, the greatest change from 1 to 2 is how much longer it is. On top of the full fledged co-op, the singleplayer took me over 30 hours to complete, compared to my 2 runs of the first game adding up to less than 5.
